mapper.insert: INSERT INTO frcs_emp_dcmnt (dcmnt_type_cd, frcs_emp_no, frcs_no, atch_file_no) VALUES (#{dcmntTypeCd}, #{frcsEmpNo}, #{frcsNo}, #{atchFileNo})
mapper.select: select A.ATCH_FILE_NO, A.FILE_SN, A.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, A.FILE_STRE_COURS, A.STRE_FILE_NM, A.FILE_THUM_YN, A.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, A.FILE_EXTSN, A.FILE_SIZE, B.DCMNT_TYPE_CD, B.FRCS_EMP_NO, B.FRCS_NO from ATCH_FILE A left outer join FRCS_EMP_DCMNT B on(A.ATCH_FILE_NO=B.ATCH_FILE_NO) where b.frcs_emp_no = #{frcsEmpNo} and b.dcmnt_type_cd = 'DCMNT01'

select A.ATCH_FILE_NO, A.FILE_SN, A.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, A.FILE_STRE_COURS, A.STRE_FILE_NM, A.FILE_THUM_YN, A.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, A.FILE_EXTSN, A.FILE_SIZE, B.DCMNT_TYPE_CD, B.FRCS_EMP_NO, B.FRCS_NO from ATCH_FILE A left outer join FRCS_EMP_DCMNT B on(A.ATCH_FILE_NO=B.ATCH_FILE_NO) where b.frcs_emp_no = #{frcsEmpNo} and b.dcmnt_type_cd = 'DCMNT02'
